description.title: Please Note That :
description.text: This project was built under Savour Services W.L.L , and it may changed since i was an intern in Savour.

description.title: About Savur
description.text: Savur is a company founded by Salman Alarayedth, Mohammed Al Fardan, Mohsen Dashti in the year 2020 and is a mobile application for offers (in-store and delivery).

description.title: Aim
description.text: The aim of this project is to create a website fo Savur customers to view al the available offers in the application , also to encourage more users to download the application.

description.title: Aim
description.text: The aim of this project is to create a systematic way of letting the marshals to register in an event, instead of the typical WhatsApp list. Also, to share the concept and the importance of marshals.

images.title: All Events Page
images.text: with the ability to edit all the event

images.title: Event Page
images.text: with the ability to register in the event

images.title: All Members Page
images.text: with the ability to edit all marshals

enft.name: enft
enft.title: ENFT -  Digital NFTs Auctioning Marketplace
enft.developedUsing: Solidity, Blockchain, Laravel, Vue.js, Tailwind Css

description.title: Developed using
description.text: Solidity, Blockchain, Laravel, Vue.js, Tailwind Css

description.title: Aim
description.text: Part of my BSc in Computer Science study's, a senior  project must be done. Therefore me and my group choose new / trending topic "NFTs" and created ENFT. With the goal to provide artists in the region a secure decentralised way to auction their art as NFTs to potential buyers. This is achieved with a decentralized application (DApp) on the Ethereum blockchain facilitated with smart contracts.

description.title: Aim
description.text: To show and not just tell my abilities and skills 🔥🔥.
